<!-- Generated by Harlequin Webmaker 2.1.3; Transducer 1.0.2 --> <HTML> <HEAD> <TITLE> The Arachne Threads System</TITLE> </HEAD> <BODY> <H1> The Arachne Threads System</H1> Principal Investigator: <A HREF="../faculty/rego.html">Vernon J. Rego</A><P> Research Assistant: B. Dimitrov<P> Sponsors: ONR, ARO<P> <IMG SRC="goldRule.gif" width =100%> <P> Arachne is a portable user-level threads system, currently under development, for distributed multithreaded applications on heterogeneous platforms. Threads are enabled with compiler-level support and runtime support. It is being designed for use with C/C++, and for the support of processes in the ParaSol distributed simulation system. <P> For more information please see <a href="http://www.cs.purdue.edu/research/PaCS/PaCS.html"> http://www.cs.purdue.edu/research/PaCS/PaCS.html</a> <P> <IMG SRC="goldRule.gif" width =100%> </BODY> </HTML> </HTML>
</DOC>
